settings.headline: Stop cravings before they start.

settings.title: Turns hunger off — the natural way.
settings.description: Berberine activates your body's metabolic switch (AMPK), improving insulin sensitivity and stabilizing blood sugar — so your appetite stays calm and controlled all day.

settings.title: Lose cravings, not energy.
